text: Carlos Alberto César Büsser (January 10, 1928 - September 29, 2012) was the commander of the Argentine Forces during Operation Rosario, that took the Falkland Islands in 1982, and forced the surrender of its Governor. Büsser was born on January 10, 1928 in Rosario, Argentina. Büsser died on September 29, 2012 in Buenos Aires, Argentina from a heart attack, aged 84. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Argentine military people Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Carlos Büsser
